Name: Minor Injury
Description: -1d to STR/RFX/INT/CHA governed Dice Pools. The injury will naturally heal over the next few days, or faster if treated actively.

Name: Medium Injury
Description: -2d to STR/RFX/INT/CHA governed Dice Pools. The injury must be treated relatively soon otherwise further penalties may apply such as infection.

Name: Serious Injury
Description: -3d to STR/RFX/INT/CHA governed Dice Pools.  The injury will lead to death in time if untreated.

Name: Fatal Injury
Description: -4d to STR/RFX/INT/CHA governed Dice Pools. The injury will lead to death very soon if untreated. The character inflicted with this injury is Physically Incapacitated (see the Narrative Effect).

Name: Death Blow Injury
Description: -5d to STR/RFX/INT/CHA governed Dice Pools. The injury causes death.
